paragraphs.text: First Paragraph. This is to test the readability of text. Right now it only works for entire blocks of text. Soon I will fix it to divide by sentences so that it can provide hints about specific sentences that need might need simplifying.

sentences.notes: Easy to read. Conversational English for consumers.
sentences.text: This is to test the readability of text.

sentences.notes: Very easy to read. Easily understood by an average 11-year-old student.
sentences.text: Right now it only works for entire blocks of text.

sentences.notes: Plain English. Easily understood by 13- to 15-year-old students.
sentences.text: Soon I will fix it to divide by sentences so that it can provide hints about specific sentences that need might need simplifying.
